metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48502 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.2. The ntfs3 subsystemdoes not properly check for correctness during disk reads, leading to anout-of-bounds read in ntfs_set_ea in fs/ntfs3/xattr.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
